What makes our snow removal unique?

We are owned and managed entirely by women. Our skill sets include detail-oriented management, efficient operations, high-level communication with clients and staff, responsive and reliable client care with the warm-hearted spirit of a woman. We are focused specifically on the cities of Port Moody, Coquitlam and Port Coquitlam in order to provide optimal reliability and prompt service to include:

  • Priority Commercial & Strata snow removal, ice management and salting
  • All-inclusive pricing – Flat Rate with No Hidden Fees
  • Unlimited snowfall & freezing event coverage
  • Multiple visits performed for impactful snow storms and freezing
  • Emergency daytime response
  • Automatic dispatch service from first to last snowfall and freezing
  • Environmentally and pet friendly organic de-icing agent
    • Condensed service area to guarantee services
  • Liability Mitigation Strategies

We have over 200 hard-working men and women on standby, ready to serve you 24 hours a day, any day of the year! This makes us one of the largest winter services provider that focuses on areas where the snow plows can’t go.

Ready to get started?

The sooner you submit an ice and snow removal quote request, the faster we can address your winter needs. Don’t be left out in the cold!
